markers.name: truncation marker start
markers.description: Set this marker at the beginning of the annotation if a word was cutted off.

markers.name: filled pause
markers.description: This marker is for the speakers hesitations like 'hm', 'ähm' and others.

markers.name: intermittent noise
markers.description: This marker is for noise like door slam, touching the microphone or something like that.

markers.name: speaker noise
markers.description: This marker is for noise which was produced by the speaker, e.g. breathing loudly, laughing or something like that.

markers.name: stationary noise
markers.description: This marker is for continuous, loud noise like traffic jam, music or radio in the background

markers.name: unclear word
markers.description: Set this marker before a word if it is not recognizable or if it is from another language.

markers.name: truncation marker end
markers.description: Set this marker only at the end of the annotation if the last word was cutted off

markers.name: break
markers.description: This marker represents a break that means a audio chunk without any speaking
